medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 13 hours prior to admission, starting in the lower abdomen and progressively worsening throughout the day, eventually becoming periumbilical and severe.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Arthritis, hypertension, gout, history of degenerative joint disease status post left knee replacement, history of back pain/lumbar disc disease status post laminectomy L2-5, history of breast masses status post right lumpectomy and left partial mastectomy, history of gallbladder disease status post cholecystectomy, history of cataracts status post surgery.
